title: PV array system connection terminal (IEC 61850)
description: copyright 2019 Open Connectivity Foundation, Inc. All rights reserved.

pvconnectionterminal_ratedarrayvoltage.description: Rated voltage of array (Nominal values of maximum power voltage * number of modules) (V)

pvconnectionterminal_ratedarraycurrent.description: Rated current of array (Nominal values of maximum power current * number of modules) (A), defined at manufacturing time.

pvconnectionterminal_arrayvoltage.description: Output voltage of array in volts (V).

pvconnectionterminal_arraycurrent.description: Output current of array in Ampere (A).

pvconnectionterminal_insulationresistanc.description: Insulation resistance of circuit breaker (M Ohm).

pvconnectionterminal_timestamp.description: An RFC3339 formatted time indicating when the data was observed (e.g.: 2016-02-15T09:19Z, 1996-12-19T16:39:57-08:00). Note that 1/100 time resolution should be used.
